sen.j: 松 貫四（まつ かんし）は歌舞伎作者の名跡。
sen.e: Kanshi MATSU is a professional name of kabuki writer.
Kanshi MATSU is a professional name of kabuki writer.
Kanshi MATSU is a professional name of kabuki writer.

sen.j: 安永期に一人、現代に一人おり、前者は後者の先祖にあたる。
sen.e: Two persons used or is using this name; the one in the Anei era and the one at present, and the former is the ancestor of the latter.
This name refers to two people; one in the Anei era and one at present, and the former is the ancestor of the latter.
sen.cmt: よりスムースに修正しました。persons→people,スペースの修正をしました。
sen.e: This name refers to two people; one in the Anei era and one at present, and the former is the ancestor of the latter.

sen.j: ただし後者が「二代目」を称していないので、正しくはどちらも単に「松貫四」である。
sen.e: The latter, however, doesn't call himself "the second", and therefore both are just "Kanshi MATSU" by right.
The latter, however, doesn't call himself 'the second,' and therefore both are correctly known as just 'Kanshi MATSU.'
sen.cmt: クォーツ、カンマの位置を修正しました。後半部分を文脈より修正しました。
sen.e: The latter, however, doesn't call himself 'the second,' and therefore both are correctly known as just 'Kanshi MATSU.'
Kanshi MATSU (the first)
Kanshi MATSU (the first)
Kanshi MATSU (the first)

sen.j: 江戸結城座の芝居茶屋の主人、??–??。
sen.e: He was the master of shibai jaya (a teahouse located within a theater) at Yukiza theater in Edo.
He was the master of the shibai jaya (a teahouse located within a theater) at Yukiza theater in Edo.
He was the master of the shibai jaya (a teahouse located within a theater) at Yukiza theater in Edo.

sen.j: 人形浄瑠璃を愛好する通人だったが、趣味が嵩じて浄瑠璃作者に。
sen.e: He was a connoisseur of ningyo joruri (traditional Japanese puppet theater), but his hobby developed into job and he became a joruri writer.
He was a connoisseur of ningyo joruri (traditional Japanese puppet theater), but his hobby developed into a job and he became a joruri writer.
He was a connoisseur of ningyo joruri (traditional Japanese puppet theater), but his hobby developed into a job and he became a joruri writer.

sen.j: しかも専門職を尻目に人気作者となり、7作を残した。
sen.e: He became much popular than other professional writers and wrote seven works.
He became much popular than other professional writers and wrote seven works.
He became much popular than other professional writers and wrote seven works.

sen.j: 『恋娘昔八丈』（お駒才三）、『伽羅先代萩』（先代萩）、『遇曾我中村』など。
sen.e: "Koimusume Mukashihachijo" (okoma Saizo), "Meiboku Sendaihagi" (Sendaihagi) and "Saikai SogaNakamura" etc.
"Koimusume Mukashihachijo" (Okoma Saiza), "Meiboku Sendaihagi" (Sendaihagi) and "Saikai Soga Nakamura" etc.
sen.cmt: okoma→Okoma,Saizo→Saiza（”才三”は”さいざ”で確認しました）Saikai SogaNakamura→Saikai Soga Nakamura と修正しました。
sen.e: "Koimusume Mukashihachijo" (Okoma Saiza), "Meiboku Sendaihagi" (Sendaihagi) and "Saikai Soga Nakamura" etc.
Kichiemon NAKAMURA (the second)
Kichiemon NAKAMURA (the second)
Kichiemon NAKAMURA (the second)
He is the descendant of the first and was born in 1944.
He is a descendant of the first and was born in 1944.
He is a descendant of the first and was born in 1944.

sen.j: 歌舞伎役者の中村吉右衛門 (2代目)が歌舞伎作者として使う筆名。
sen.e: Kabuki actor Kichiemon NAKAMURA (the second) is using this name as his pen name of kabuki writer.
The pan name which Kabuki actor Kichiemon NAKAMURA (the second) uses as a kabuki writer.
sen.cmt: よりスムースな流れに修正しました。
sen.e: The pan name which Kabuki actor Kichiemon NAKAMURA (the second) uses as a kabuki writer.

sen.j: 『再桜遇清水』、『巴御前』、『日向嶋景清』、『閻魔と政頼』など。
sen.e: "Saikaizakura misomeno kiyozumi", "Tomoe Gozen", "Hinimukau shimano kagekiyo" and "Enma to Seirai" etc.
"Saikaizakura misomeno kiyomizu," "Tomoe Gozen", "Hinimukau shimano kagekiyo" and "Enma to Seirai" etc.
sen.cmt: kiyozumi→kiyomizu,カンマの位置を修正しました。
sen.e: "Saikaizakura misomeno kiyomizu," "Tomoe Gozen", "Hinimukau shimano kagekiyo" and "Enma to Seirai" etc.
